img.title: Home
img.rs-layer:
Welcome to
McBain Rural Agricultural School

div.class: vc_message_box vc_message_box-standard vc_message_box-rounded vc_color-info wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_appear appear
div.p: This website is currently being redesigned to comply with both Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act and Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act. If you see anything on this site that does not comply with either Act please notify us immediately so we can correct the problem.

div.class: vc_message_box vc_message_box-standard vc_message_box-rounded vc_color-danger wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_appear appear

p.a: Click here for more infromation about the Coronavirus and how our district is preparing for the virus.

div.class: vc_message_box vc_message_box-standard vc_message_box-rounded vc_color-alert-success wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_appear appear

p.a: McBain will be providing breakfast and lunch to any student starting April 21. Click here for more information.

div.h4: How can I change/remove my phone number on the School Messenger system?

div.p: Please call the School office at anytime and they will transfer you to the technology department.

div.class: vc_toggle vc_toggle_round vc_toggle_color_default vc_toggle_color_inverted vc_toggle_size_md wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_bounceInLeft bounceInLeft

div.h4: What time does school start in the morning?

div.p: School starts at 8:01am for both the Middle School and High School. Elementary starts at 7:55am.

div.class: vc_toggle vc_toggle_round vc_toggle_color_default vc_toggle_color_inverted vc_toggle_size_md wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_bounceInLeft bounceInLeft

div.h4: How do I take attendance in Power School if I am a substitute teacher

p.a: You can go to the Power School substitute page by clicking here.

p.a: Click here to join the Ramblers!

p.span: On Thursday, April 2, Governor Whitmer provided an Executive Order that mandated the closure of all Michigan schools for the remainder of the school year.

We understand the hardship this closure puts on our families, as well as the social and emotional impact it may have on our students. This school closure will obviously raise many questions for students and families. Please know that our administration and staff have been working closely together the past weeks and continue to do so, in order to answer these questions and move our district forward. More information will be available for you in the coming days. We will continue to work together to care for each other, our students, and our community.

Our staff remains dedicated to our students and the McBain Rural Agricultural School District Family. We are committed to ensuring supports for our students and families are in place so that our students continue learning during this school closure.
Your McBain Rambler Administration and Staff
